text.author: Santa Barbara Corpus of Spoken American English (ed. John W. Du Bois)
text.title: Lambada
text.summary: While discussing plans to go to a dance class in Bahia to learn lambada dancing, Miles tells his friends about an attractive woman he had seen dancing lewdly with a man there.
text.summary2: Jamie is curious about going to a Lambada class Miles has been to and asks him what it's like, and the story he tells about the stupefying promiscuity he witnessed at a past class ends up convincing Jamie she shouldn't attend.
